x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Cities across Africa face poor waste management due to uncoordinated pickups and route inefficiencies. Also there is no adequate means to dispose of waste and this causes pollution in both urban areas and cities in Nigeria and across Africa.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: CleanCity360 – Waste Collection and Recycling Route Optimizer
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

This solution will use the products listed and not limited to the following;

  • Field Service Management for route optimization.
  • Flow Designer for automated pickup scheduling.
  • Performance Analytics dashboards for city managers.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

The use of GPS-enabled devices for waste trucks and optionally using IntegrationHub for IoT bin sensors.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

The cost of hardware for tracking equipment and also training city workers on new tech, these can be quite challenging.
